title: Did Madame Tussauds Dress Trump Statue in Golf Attire After Election Defeat?
subtitle: The world-famous London museum had some fun at the expense of the outgoing U.S. president in November 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In November 2020, Madame Tussauds in London replaced the business suit on its effigy of Donald Trump with a golfing outfit.
